summary: Project involves a video player interface with play/pause controls, fullscreen playback, and optional timer overlay.

existing_features.title: Add a visible play/pause button to the UI. Clicking the button or pressing the spacebar should toggle video playback between playing and paused states.
When the video starts playing, the UI enters a fullscreen mode that hides all application chrome (navigation bars, panels, controls, overlays) and shows only the video filling the entire screen.

Provide a user-accessible toggle or setting that lets the user choose between two fullscreen playback modes: (1) plain video with no overlays, and (2) the user's currently selected timer displayed as an overlay on top of the fullscreen video. The chosen mode should persist across sessions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a play button that toggles play/pause on click or spacebar press
When video plays, enter fullscreen mode showing only the video (no UI chrome)
User can choose to display a timer overlay on top of the fullscreen video or keep it plain
